news.title: Maharashtra: MPCB officials start dust checks at construction sites to curb pollution
news.para: The Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (MPCB) issued directions in this regard last week. The officials have started the checks in Mumbai and are expected to follow suit in Pune in the days to come.

news.title: DB Realty divests 100% stake in Real Gem Buildtech for about Rs 231.42 crore
news.para: Consequent upon the aforesaid sale, Real Gem Buildtech will cease to be a wholly owned subsidiary of DB Realty. The transaction will lead to considerable amount of free cashflow to the company.

news.title: UltraTech Cement receives order for GST demand & penalty worth Rs 2.28 crore
news.para: UltraTech Cement will seek legal recourse to contest the above order since the differential duty with interest was already deposited, but has not been taken cognizance of by the authority.

news.title: Law proposed to regulate housing societies in Gujarat
news.para: An authority may be established to oversee housing societies, as the current registrar of cooperatives lacks the manpower to handle their matters. Additionally, many residential housing societies have not had their accounts audited for years.

news.title: Bengaluru development body told to register project with Karnataka-RERA
news.para: The directive came in K-RERA’s interim order on November 3, while hearing a complaint filed by a site allottee seeking relief of interest on the delay period and direction to the promoter to complete the project.

news.title: Gurugram: Building plans filed, town planner told to speed up structural audit of highrises
news.para: The ADC directed DTP to immediately share estimates with the concerned builder management so that the audit work can be started and completed as soon as possible.

news.title: No registration for 182 realty projects, says MahaRERA
news.para: Promoters of as many as 222 projects had requested the MahaRera to lift the suspension by stating that they had not only paid the penalty, but also updated their quarterly progress reports.

news.title: SoftBank's WeWork, once most valuable U.S. startup, succumbs to bankruptcy
news.para: The move represents an admission by SoftBank, the Japanese technology group that owns about 60% of WeWork and has invested billions of dollars in its turnaround, that the company cannot survive unless it renegotiates its pricey leases in bankruptcy.

news.title: Repco Home Finance's net profit up 37.88% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Repco Home Finance's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 383.91 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 20.89 per cent from Rs 317.58 crore in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Private credit sees opportunity in Australia real estate as banks hesitate
news.para: The funds available for deals are growing as investors including pension funds, sovereign wealth and insurance firms look for meaty returns hard to find in today's equity markets, especially in the beaten-down real estate sector.

news.title: Jaiprakash Associates defaults on Rs 4,258 crore loans
news.para: The loans pertained to various banks, and the nature of the obligation is fund-based working capital, non-fund-based working capital, term loans and FCCB (foreign currency convertible bonds).

news.title: Sobha's net profit dips 21.98% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Sobha's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 773.64 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 12.03 per cent from Rs 690.58 crore in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Rushil Decor's net profit dips 60.44% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Rushil Decor's net total income stood at Rs 205.13 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 0.63 per cent from Rs 203.84 crore in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Bajaj Electricals' net profit dips 56% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Bajaj Electricals' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,142.26 crore in Q2 FY24, a dip of 1.82 per cent from Rs 1,163.43 crore in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: RCCPL to invest Rs 400 crore to set up 1.40 million tons cement grinding unit in Prayagraj
news.para: RCCPL plans to invest Rs 400 crore and the proposed capacity is expected to be added within financial year 2025-26. The money will be raised through mix of debt and internal accruals.

news.title: Kolte Patil Developers' net loss widens to Rs 26.23 crore in Q2 FY24
news.para: Kolte Patil Developers' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 204.86 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 48.70 per cent from Rs 137.77 crore in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: HeidelbergCement India posts net profit of Rs 35.80 crore in Q2 FY24
news.para: HeidelbergCement India's net total income stood at Rs 580.72 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 12.31 per cent from Rs 517.06 crore in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Andhra Pradesh government likely to tweak industrial land policy
news.para: Although the state cabinet cleared the new land allotment policy at its recent meeting chaired by the chief minister YS Jagan Mohan Reddy, it had directed the industries department to ready the comprehensive plan on the issue.

news.title: Bengaluru: Apartments with STPs cry foul as BWSSB imposes sanitary fee
news.para: Sanitary charges are typically levied for wastewater removal from buildings. Apartments with more than 20 flats are required to treat their sewage by establishing sewage treatment plants (STPs) as per BWSSB rules introduced in 2014.

news.title: Pune civic body seals 40 assets over property tax dues
news.para: Property tax department head Ajit Deshmukh said, “The civic administration sent out notices to the defaulters. When they did not pay despite repeated warnings, we began the sealing process.”
